DOC.brief_summary: A Randomized , Open-label , Single-dose , 2-Sequence , 2-Period , Crossover Study Assess Safety Pharmacokinetics Nateglinide/Metformin HCl Combined Tablet Compared Nateglinide 120 mg Tablet Metformin HCl 500 mg Tablet Fasting Conditions Healthy Male Subjects
